pages.text: $(li)The Crimson Mosquito is a very big flying hostile creature that likes to suck the blood of their preys.$(br)$(li)They live in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/crimson_forest)Crimson Forests$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li)These creatures may be drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/blood_sac)Blood Sac$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/mosquito_proboscis)Crimson Mosquito Proboscis$(/l) upon death.
Don't try to burn them, they're fire resistant!
